metadata.questionText: \text{For a 3Ã—3 system with}\\[0.5em]\text{coefficient matrix A,}\\[0.5em]\text{if det(A) = 0, what are}\\[0.5em]\text{the possibilities?}
metadata.explanation: If det(A) = 0, the matrix is singular (not invertible). The system is either inconsistent (no solution) or has infinitely many solutions (dependent equations). Which case depends on whether the right-hand side is consistent with the equations.
